bibl.title: Corrigendum: No Arabic on a Greek Ostracon.
bibl.note: Complément à: IDEM, From Work on the Petra Papyri: Arabic on a Greek Ostracon from Roman Egypt and the Name of the Church Father Sozomen, ZPE 131 (2000) pp. 173-176. Pour l'interprétation du mot olgitta se rallie à: Adam BÜLOW-JACOBSEN, Ghost-Vegetable. A Re-edition of SB VI 9610, ZPE 110 (1996) pp. 124-126. <olgitta>
bibl.seg: DANIEL Robert W., Corrigendum: No Arabic on a Greek Ostracon.
